commands.name: az scvmm vm guest-agent enable
commands.summary: Enable guest agent on the vm.
examples: az scvmm vm guest-agent enable --username contoso-user --password contoso-pass                --resource-group contoso-rg --subscription contoso-sub                --vm-name contoso-vm

commands.name: az scvmm vm guest-agent show
commands.summary: Get details of a guest agent by guest agent name, resource-group and vm name.
examples: az scvmm vm guest-agent show --resource-group contoso-rg                --vm-name contoso-vm
